column1: Little Goat Diner////This was my first time dining in one of the Stephanie Izard franchises
column2: and I wasn't disappointed. Located in the West Loop
column3: this holds down the corner across from Bar Siena. I recommend making a reservation
column4: and possibly dining early. We made ours for 530pm on a Saturday(blue plate anyone?) but it actually made perfect sense...the place was plenty busy already anyway
column6: the throng of expectant diners waiting near the door just grew and grew and grew. Made our early dining time seem like a super smart idea! Of course
column7: I can't take the credit for eating at 530. My usual dinner time is about 9pm
column8: so...all credit goes to the lady.
